product_name: Kiss My Face Treatmint Lip Balm SPF 30 - 0.15 oz.
long_description: Kiss My Face Treatmint SPF 30 mint lip balm is designed for active adults and children. This long-lasting, minty-fresh lip balm will soothe your chapped lips with natural and organic ingredients. Contains natural beeswax, coconut oil, vitamin E and shea butter; lip balm is scented with spearmint essential oils. Water-resistant lip balm is biodegradable, paraben free and phthalate free; contains no artificial flavors. SPF 30 protection helps block harmful ultraviolet rays. Not tested on animals.
short_description: Kiss My Face Treatmint SPF 30 mint lip balm is designed for active adults and children. This long-lasting, minty-fresh lip balm will soothe your chapped lips with natural and organic ingredients.
